greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: Sum_{n>=0} x^n * (1 - x^n)^n.
comment: Compare to the curious identity: Sum_{n=-oo..+oo} x^n * (1 - x^n)^n  =  0.
link: Paul D. Hanna, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2050
mathematica: terms = 100; 1 + Sum[x^n*(1 - x^n)^n, {n, 1, terms}] + O[x]^terms // CoefficientList[#, x]& (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 16 2017 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A=1); A = sum(k=0, n+1, x^k*(1-x^k)^k + O(x^(n+2))); polcoeff(A, n)}
(PARI) {a(n) = local(A=1); A = sum(k=1, n+1, -1/x^k / (1 - 1/x^k + O(x^(n+2)) )^k + O(x^(n+2))); polcoeff(A, n)}
(PARI) {a(n) = local(A=1); A = sum(k=1, sqrtint(n)+1, (-1)^(k-1) * x^(k^2-k)/(1-x^k)^k + O(x^(n+2))); polcoeff(A, n)}
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jul 17 2015
